short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In HTML editor page, save changes using Ctrl + S (Windows, Linux, ChromeOS). A blue border under Save button will appear.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inject a script and listen to Ctrl + S keyboard combination in Blogger Theme HTML editor page. Make it easier to save changes using Ctrl + S (Windows, Linux, ChromeOS). A blue border under Save button will appear when the extension is read.
